Name: Portrait of a Lady with Pale Face
Description: This half-body portrait shows a woman with a pale face. She is dressed in purple garments and her dark, frizzy hair is combed round her forehead and covers the upper parts of her ears. She is wearing a crescent-shaped pendant suspended from a gold chain and her earrings are studded with pearls.The style of the portrait suggests that it was painted in the first century A.D.
